description.other_details: Derived from: Care Plan, Draft Archetype [Internet]. Australian Digital Health Agency, Australian Digital Health Agency Clinical Knowledge Manager [cited: 2016-08-22]. Available from: http://dcm.nehta.org.au/ckm/#showArchetype_1013.1.1220

details.purpose: To record activity regarding the planning and carrying out of a single care plan as a whole.
details.use: Use to record activity regarding the planning and carrying out of a single care plan as a whole.
details.misuse: Not to be used to record activity of individual components of a care plan - use the specific ACTION archetype appropriate for each activity.
details.copyright: Â© Australian Digital Health Agency, openEHR Foundation

items.items: Plan or sequence of discrete activities developed to achieve a specified management goal or treatment outcome, carried out by health professionals and/or the patient.
Need for a care plan has been identified.
Care plan activities commenced and in progress.
Care plan components identified and documented.
Care plan duration has passed the 'Expiry Date'.
All activities related to the care plan have been reconciled or completed.
Anticipated date beyond which the care plan can be deemed 'expired'.
Description of activity performed/enacted against the plan.
Reason for activity being performed /enacted against the plan.
Care plan has been cancelled prior to commencement.
Commencement of care plan has been temporarily postponed to a future date.
Care plan is temporarily suspended but intended to resume at a later date.
